overview: During the Argentine dictatorship of the eighties, two gravediggers are in charge of burying all the N.N. that arrive at the cemetery. One afternoon they bring the corpse of a beautiful girl whom they both fall in love with. That rainy night will be the excuse for a reflection in candle on the friendship, the old age and the bitter beauty.

production_companies.name: Escuela Profesional de Cine de Eliseo Subiela

title: Muerte, no seas mujer
